data.name: The Last Dogma - Soundtrack (FLAC & MP3)
data.detailed_description:
You can now listen it on YouTube before buying:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PLHPBRWPQtM

Official soundtrack for the game The Last Dogma, composed and performed by Sasha Darko.

Tracklist:

01 – Ages After Ages, Nothing Changes [2:00]
02 – The Last Disbeliever [2:11]
03 – The Abandoned World [2:26]
04 – The Offices [1:58]
05 – Year 1366 Theme [3:05]
06 – The Dungeons [1:36]
07 – Escape [0:57]
08 – Vasasu (TLD Cut) [2:00]
09 – Transparence (Instrumental) [1:03]
10 – Chapter Select [0:57]
11 – The Last Disbeliever (Alternate Version) [2:39]

Credits:
Sasha Darko - guitar, drums, synthesizers, samplers, vocals

The Last Dogma soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as FLAC and MP3 files. You must have The Last Dogma installed on your computer as well to receive the DLC content.

Secret Track Note:
There's a secret track available which is called "The Desert". It plays during the desert level and was composed and performed by Valeria Samatova. In order to get it, simply write an empty message with a "DESERT" headline to official support e-mail. I'll send it to you personally ASAP.

The Last Dogma soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as FLAC and MP3 files. You must have The Last Dogma installed on your computer as well to receive the DLC content.

There's a secret track available which is called "The Desert". It plays during the desert level and was composed and performed by Valeria Samatova. In order to get it, simply write an empty message with a "DESERT" headline to official support e-mail. I'll send it to you personally ASAP.
